title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Skills: Strategic Organizational Learning and Power Dynamics Analysis: Simulation-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners critically analyze how organizational power structures influence strategic planning processes.

Learners identify organizational learning barriers and propose improvement strategies.
